comments.body: It's impossible or risky to play sports betting on a gambling site that doesn't ask KYC as most bookies should be regulated or have licensed to operate and if there's a bookies that offers no KYC, that is risky and they are most likely to get away with your money. Alternatively you can play casino without KYC such as blockchain games or something like Bustabit. Well honestly, I don't recommend playing on a sports betting that is not licensed or regulated it is still much better to play on a bookies that is reputable even if they ask to confirm your identity.
